issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] make accumulate_scalar somewhat exhaustive and easier to read
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4493](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4493). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
make accumulate_scalar somewhat exhaustive and easier to read

 

The current implementation doesn't leverage any of the exhaustiveness checking of matching.This can be made simpler and partially exhaustive.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4493?focusedCommentId=16950366) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This issue was created against the original codebase. This code has been re-implemented since then and I don't think this still applies.
